metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Software, Programming, and Databases
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Discover the world of software with this comprehensive course designed for beginners. Gain an understanding of various types of software and how to manage software from an IT perspective. This course covers the basics of software, cloud computing, web browsers, development concepts, programming languages, and database fundamentals.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Software Development Process,database management,IT Fundamentals,Software Application Development,Computer Programming,
